page.title: 06The Castle Hotel
page.content: It was built in 1763. It is 223 years old. It has a popular skittle alley. They use the garden as a beer garden. The present owners discovered the Castle in an advert. The liked the environment very much. They sell keg bitter,bottled beers and light ale. They stock an average amount of soft drinks, 55's, coke, lemonade, squash and cordial.We were assured that there were few drunks.The staff are concerned that longer drinking hours may make it difficult to find more staff.The Castle used to brew its own beer. It is illegal to give credit and to gamble in the bar.It is also illegal for those under 18 years of age to use gaming machines or to consume alcohol. The official opening times include 7 hours on Sundays and 9 hours every other day of the week.
